panelists.name: David Myles
panelists.short_description: Somewhere on the spectrum between James Taylor and Justin Timberlake, David Myles has truly forged his own path by embracing modern and vintage pop, folk, and soul music.

panelists.name: Marshall Button
panelists.short_description: Born and raised in Dalhousie, NB, actor, playwright, director Marshall Button resides in Moncton, NB where he occupies the post of artist-in-residence at The Capitol Theatre.

panelists.name: Lydia Miljan
panelists.short_description: Lydia Miljan is an associate professor of political science and chair of the Arts and Science program at the University of Windsor.

panelists.name: Leslie Stojsic
panelists.short_description: Leslie Stojsic has been a producer with CBC News since 2001. She worked with Peter Mansbridge for more than a decade, producing panels on The National, as well as interviews for Mansbridge One on One.
